infos.value: You can work together and interact with other players while in a guild.
As there are many things that you will be able to do once you join a guild, I strongly suggest that you join one.
I recommend that you join a guild.
I believe that joining a guild on a trial basis is the prime opportunity to learn how they operate. As you will only be a temporary member for one week's time, please use the trial if you so desire.

• Joining Guilds •
Joining an established Guild includes both joining as a regular Guild Member and joining on a trial basis for a limited time in order to gain hands-on experience.

• Guild Trials •
By participating in a Trial, you can join a guild and participate as a Member for a limited time.
You can get hands-on experience with all Guild functions.
• Joining Guild on a Trial Basis •

• Joining Guild on a Trial Basis •
Out of the Guilds that allow Trial participants, a Guild recommended by the automatic search will be joined on a trial basis.

• Guild Search •
If a Guild is not found, please wait a while and search again.
Proceed to a tutorial on Joining Guilds?
